sentences.en: A black fox came toward him, carrying a ptarmigan in his mouth.
sentences.cn: 一只黑狐狸朝他走了过来, 嘴里叼着一只松鸡.

sentences.en: But he could not stop, for the mother ptarmigan was running on.
sentences.cn: 不过他不能停下, 因为母松鸡正在向前跑.

sentences.en: It was a fearful cry, but the fox, leaping away in fright, did not drop the ptarmigan.
sentences.cn: 这是一种可怕的喊声，那只狐狸吓跑了，可是没有丢下松鸡。

sentences.en: Those interviewed spoke of a change in the range of species of mammals (moose and beaver) as well as a decrease in the number of some bird species (ptarmigan).
sentences.cn: 这次采访中也提到，哺乳动物（麋鹿和海狸）的种群范围正在减小，同样某些鸟类的种群（如松鸡）的数量也在减少。

sentences.en: Those interviewed spoke of a change in the range of species of mammals (moose and beaver) as well as a decrease in the number of some bird species (ptarmigan).
sentences.cn: 受访者提到哺乳动物（驯鹿和海狸）种群范围的变化，也提到某些鸟类（松鸡）数量下降。

trans.tran_en: any of several arctic and subarctic grouse of the genus Lagopus, esp L
